member.name: M:pelsoft.auth.helpers.apiHelper.ToEpoch(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a DateTime to the long representation which is the number of seconds since the unix epoch. Epoch (UNIX Epoch time) : It is the number of seconds that have elapsed since 00:00:00 Thursday, 1 January 1970,[2] Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), minus leap seconds.
member.param: A DateTime to convert to epoch time.
member.returns: The long number of seconds since the unix epoch.

member.name: M:pelsoft.auth.helpers.apiHelper.FromEpoch(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts a long representation of time since the unix epoch to a DateTime.
member.param: The number of seconds since Jan 1, 1970. Epoch (UNIX Epoch time) : It is the number of seconds that have elapsed since 00:00:00 Thursday, 1 January 1970,[2] Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), minus leap seconds.
member.returns: A DateTime representing the time since the epoch.
